Posts.Content: Go on internet and look up. “ Picture of lemons representing sign of Cancer” fabulous illustration. I saw the “dent and checked it out, it was cancer but I’m ok now. Report Reply
Posts.Title: Inverted nipples

Posts.Content: See your doctor ASAP and demand a mastectomy and ultrasound! Don’t fool around with this. I had a slight indentation which was cancer. Ladies do not believe your doctors if they say pain means it is not cancer. It may be “Probably not” but I can tell you that I had  soreness which was cancer. The idiot dictor tried to send me home but I screamed I want a mammogram! Lied about when I had the last one.  During daily radiation treatments I met MANY women who were in late states of breast and ovarian cancers because their doctors told the. if it hurts it is not cancer. wrong! My case, the cancer was pushing against something, and made me sore. Report 1 Reply
Posts.Title: Inverted nipple
